snippet: Booms of outgoing artillery shaking the ground, militia fighters from the remote Libyan mountain town of Zintan hunker down in the passenger terminal to defend Tripoli airport, the biggest prize in the capital....

headline.print_headline: Town vs. Town, Faction vs. Faction as Libya Descends Into 'Hurricane'
headline.main: Town vs. Town, Faction vs. Faction as Libya Descends Into 'Hurricane'

lead_paragraph: Booms of outgoing artillery shaking the ground, militia fighters from the remote Libyan mountain town of Zintan hunker down in the passenger terminal to defend Tripoli airport, the biggest prize in the capital.
